description: Stores data for College of American Pathologists (CAP) form field 76061-Additional Pathologic Findings in the Accessory Findings section.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ADDL_PAT_FND_AF_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Additional Pathologic Findings for Accessory Findings.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Adenocarcinoma of prostate (use protocol for carcinoma of prostate)


Urothelial carcinoma ivlv urethra, prostatic ducts and acini invasion


Not applicable
